header.title: Software developer & Travel enthusiast
header.description: My name is Mees Postma, I am currently studying HBO-ICT at the Hogeschool Utrecht. Outside of school, I also manage a company called Hubsor. For more information about me, check out the About me page!

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Do you have a question, or do you want to know more about me? Please contact me. Send me an email, or go to my LinkedIn.
